title: why am i getting so much ip???
body: ive been getting 100+ ip all day got 300 for first win of the day im just wondering is it double ip weekend or what im NOT Complaining trust me :P im just curious

replies.body:
yeah its double ip weekend:

>  DOUBLE IP WEEKEND from midnight April 21 to 11:59 PM April 23 Pacific time. 

source: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/get-special-xayah-and-rakan-icons-when-they-launch
